mdRecord.dcterms:title: Maryland Room, Mt. Vernon Mansion
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson, N. G. (Newton G.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cabinet card of the Chintz Room. View towards south wall includes fireplace, closet and furnishings. A label adhered to the reverse of the cardboard mount reads: Maryland Room, Mt. Vernon Mansion, or Bed Chamber of Eleanor Custis, Washington's adopted daughter, showing the Bedstead and steps used by her. N. G. Johnson, Photographer, 426 7th St., Washington, D. C. (partial cropped). A blue ink stamp reads: Copyright 1880 by the Mount Vernon Association.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Mansion interiors
p Chintz Room
